label11: Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III is a telephoto zoom lens ideal for day to day use. AF via front group extension system with DC micro motor. NO image stabilization. Versatile telephoto focal range ideal for portraiture and magnifying distant subjects
label8: Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II is a standard zoom versatile lens for everyday shooting. Optical Image Stabilization technology. 11 elements in 9 groups with 1 aspherical lens element
